ygData.subject: Re: Everquest Cheats over 30 of them
ygData.msgSnippet: I appoligize if what I did seemed underhanded.  I didn t mean for it to be.  I figured that I would offer cheats and hacking info every few days and post my
ygData.messageBody:
I appoligize if what I did seemed underhanded. I didn't mean for it
to be. I figured that I would offer cheats and hacking info every
few days and post my website if anyone would be interested in
purchasing all the cheats right away.

I though it would be nice if I posted some cheats along with my
website so that I wouldn't just be advertising my guide.

Again, I appologize if I've offended anyone

Thanks,

Craig






--- In EQCheats@egroups.com, "Mycaell" <mycaell@f...> wrote:
> Incredible, why didn't you just say I'm selling a cheat book, go to
my web
> page to buy it.
>
> I actually might have purchased your book and info if you had of
been honest
> in your approach.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Craig Baldwin <craigba@v...>
> To: <EQCheats@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 1:47 PM
> Subject: [EQCheats] Everquest Cheats over 30 of them
>
>
> I started a website devoted to cheats and hacking in
everquest...I'll
> post a few over the next few days and see how you like them.
>
> My website is at http://www.everquestbugs.com
>
> Here's a grouping bug that lets a 7th member in your group
>
> This 7th member won't be able to talk in the group but I'm
> told that
> he will able to read what the other member in the group say. This
> 7th member will not sure up on the grouping list. Also this 7th
> member will gain exp as if he were in the group. I have no tried
> this bug so I can't verify that it works but here it goes:
>
> If you have 6 people in a group have one of them disband and
> then reinvite him,.then invite the 7th person and have them join
> in a
> certain order (not sure what order so you might have to play around
> with this one). This bug was submitted by a member of my website
and
> he himself said that he was in a group with 7 people because at one
> point the 7th person went link dead and it told the group the he
went
> linkdead.
>
> Thanks and let me know if you want more cheats or you can just go to
> my website,
>
> Craig
>
>
>
